metadata.name: Webshell Hacking Activity Patterns
metadata.comment: Detects certain parent child patterns found in cases in which a web shell is used to perform certain credential dumping or exfiltration activities on a compromised system

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\caddy.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\httpd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\nginx.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\php-cgi.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\w3wp.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\ws_tomcatservice.exe')) OR (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\java.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\javaw.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('-tomcat-')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\tomcat'))) OR (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\java.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\javaw.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('catalina.jar')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('catalina_home')))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('comsvcs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -hp')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' a ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -m')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('net')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' user ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /add')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('net')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' localgroup ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' administrators ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/add')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ntdsutil.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ldifde.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\adfind.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\procdump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\nanodump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vssadmin.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\fsutil.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -decode ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -nop ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -w hidden ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /decode ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /ticket:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' sekurlsa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dmp full')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.downloadfile(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.downloadstring(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('frombase64string')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('process call create')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg save ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('whoami /priv'))))

output.summary: Detects certain parent child patterns found in cases in which a web shell is used to perform certain credential dumping or exfiltration activities on a compromised system
